historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-111, see notes following ยง 16-4401.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon ยง 26 of the Uniform Arbitration Act (2000). See Vol. 7, Pt. I, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 16-4426

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A court of the District of Columbia having jurisdiction over the controversy and the parties may enforce an agreement to arbitrate.
An agreement to arbitrate providing for arbitration in the District of Columbia confers exclusive jurisdiction on the court to enter judgment on an award under this chapter.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)
